Text: works 100% ! downloading 2.0.9199.0 + avatar so i can install game's/dlc's on my banned 360 xD ! Thanks again !
Guys im having a problem... i have a banned console that is updated to v9199 but when i want to watch a cideo or to customize my avatar its says that i need an update. Help?
Download the latest update and burn it or put on flash drive. this will allow you to update while being banned. then your videos will work etc.

@OneHitGamer

I tried using the latest update with this program but it doesent work.
Do note that system updates do not contain the video codec stuff - for that you will need to go online once on Xbox Live, and the downloaded codec is xbox and/or HD dependent.
